Mixin: Lockable

baqend.util. Lockable

This mixin provides an lock interface to execute exclusive operations
Source:
  • util/Lockable.js, line 1

Members

_deferred

A deferred used to explicit lock and unlock this instance

Indicates if there is currently an onging exclusive operation

isReady

Indicates if there is currently no exclusive operation executed

Methods

lock() → {Promise.<*>}

Try to acquire an exclusive lock, the lock must be released with the baqend.util.Lockable#unlock() method
Source:
  • util/Lockable.js, line 76
Throws:
if there is a lock acquired
Type
Error
Returns:
A promise which will be resolved, when the lock is released
Type
Promise.<*>

ready(doneCallback) → {Promise.<baqend.binding.Entity>}

Waits on the previously requested operation and calls the doneCallback if the operation is fulfilled
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
doneCallback baqend.util.Lockable~callback <optional>
 The callback which will be invoked when the previously operations on this object is completed.
Source:
  • util/Lockable.js, line 42
Returns:
A promise which completes successfully, when the previously requested operation completes
Type
Promise.<baqend.binding.Entity>

unlock()

Unlock a previously acquired lock
Source:
  • util/Lockable.js, line 94
Throws:
if there is no lock acquired
Type
Error

withLock(callback) → {Promise.<baqend.binding.Entity>}

Try to aquire an exclusive lock and executes the given callback.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
callback baqend.util.Lockable~callback The exclusive operation to execute
Source:
  • util/Lockable.js, line 57
Throws:
If the lock can't be aquired
Type
Error
Returns:
A promise
Type
Promise.<baqend.binding.Entity>

Type Definitions

callback() → {Promise.<*>}

The operation callback is used by the baqend.util.Lockable#withLock method, to perform an exclusive operation on the entity.
Source:
  • util/Lockable.js, line 104
Returns:
A Promise, which reflects the result of the operation

Promise.<*>
